src:
Jury convicts Oklahoma police officer of second-degree murder in shooting of man who threatened ...
05 Nov 2019, 02:00 by EndPlay
OKLAHOMA CITY - OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) - Jury convicts Oklahoma police officer of second-degree murder in shooting of man who threatened to set himself on fire.
